title: Butter Pecan Cake
ingredients: ['275g butter, divided', '240g chopped pecans', '375g plain flour, sifted', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '400g caster sugar', '4 eggs', '250ml milk', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', 'Creamy Butter Icing', '50g butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '500g icing sugar, sifted', '75ml whipping cream']
